text: Louis Mayer (1868-1941) was a Monegasque lawyer. He was an advisor to Albert I, Prince of Monaco. He was also the executor of his will. He served on the boards of the Oceanographic Institute, which runs the Oceanographic Museum, and the Institute of Human Paleology. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Monegasque lawyers
title: Louis Mayer (lawyer)
